10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Qatadah said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)leading the people in prayer, carrying Umamah bint Abi Al-As on his shoulder. When he bowed he put her down and when he stood up from prostration he picked her up again

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَجُوزُ لِلإِمَامِ مِنَ الْعَمَلِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What is permissible for the Imam to do during the prayer
